description.value: You conjure uncanny orbs of spiritual flame that float above or below the water's surface. You can cast the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Ignition] cantrip as a primal innate spell at will, heightened to a spell rank equal to half your level rounded up. Your ignition spell takes the form of orbs of fire, and you can cast it underwater.
